description: woman with black ear-length hair with bangs dressed in a black dress sits in a landscape with hands folded in her lap; she leans slightly to the left; background on the bottom of the image is colored in green; middle ground is in red with a row of black trees; upper half of the image is blue sky with black birds
inscription: LL margin of sheet, in pencil: Probedruck 1. | BC margin of sheet, in pencil: E 82-4 Steine (Schwarzstein II. Fassung, Blaustein I. Fassung. Weichstein fehlt) F | LLC of sheet in pencil, on verso: 2016
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 20 / 21 H. | LL in pencil, below image: Mädchen am See
title: Girl at the Lake (Sonia Gramatté)
